title: Title
contactsLinks: Where should applications for access be made
requirements: Conditions or requirements a potential user needs to fulfil to apply for access
descriptionLinks: Step-by step description or a visual representation of the ABS procedure
hasApplicationDocuments: Does the applicant need to provide any documents
applicationInformation: Information on application forms or required documents
applicationLinks: Relevant application form/documents or a link to website
applicationContacts: Information on whom the application should be sent to
duration: How long does the application process take
relevantDocuments: Other relevant links or attached documents
